short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Login without a hassle into Relution

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the "Remember Me" Checkbox that only stores Usernames. Removes already stored Usernames, so AutoFill works again. Moves the Login Button after the Password Field, so you only have to tab twice instead of four times to hit the Login Button. Fixes that the Login Button is disabled when using AutoFill.
